abstract: USA Shooting files lawsuit against some of its athletes and officials over management and transparency as start of 2016 Olympics nears.
lead_paragraph: USA Shooting has filed a lawsuit against some of its athletes and officials in a dispute over management and transparency at the national governing body.

headline.main: Legal Dispute Roils U.S.A. Shooting Team as Rio Olympics Approach
headline.print_headline: Legal Dispute Engulfs the U.S.A. Shooting Team

snippet: USA Shooting has filed a lawsuit against some of its athletes and officials in a dispute over management and transparency at the national governing body.
